devEnvironmentWarnings.dummy: This is a demo instance of FTS Admin, information you enter here will only be stored in your browser, and will not be sent to our server
devEnvironmentWarnings.dev: This is a test instance of FTS Admin, information you enter here will be periodically deleted.

acceptableUseNotification.title: Acceptable Use Notification
acceptableUseNotification.p1: Unauthorized access to this United Nations Computer System is prohibited by ST/SGB/2004/15 ("Use of information and communication technology resources and data" of 29 November 2004)
acceptableUseNotification.p2: Authorized users shall ensure that their use of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) resources and ICT data is consistent with their obligations as staff members or such other obligations as may apply to them
acceptableUseNotification.p3: All use of ICT resources and ICT data is subject to monitoring and investigation as set forth in ST/SGB/2004/15
acceptableUseNotification.p4: Use of this system by any user, authorized or unauthorized, constitutes consent to the applicable UN regulations and rules

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.info: We were unable to find the page you were looking for

noResultTable.title: No results found
noResultTable.description: Your filters did not match any results. Please modify your filter selection

unsupportedBrowser.title: Unsupported Browser!
unsupportedBrowser.info: Unfortunately, your current browser is not supported. Please switch to either Firefox or Google Chrome. To do this, simply copy the form address (URL) above, then open Firefox or Chrome, and paste the address into the browser.

rejectPendingFlows.message: Do you want to reject the selected pending flows?

flowsTable.downloadDisabled: Download only allowed when there is at least one filter applied, and there is more than one flow on the table
flowsTable.totalAmountDisabled: Total Amount only allowed when there are is least one filter applied

tableSettings.info: Leaving without clicking the 'Save' button will not update the table

info.filterInfo: Using ',' sepparated values will create multiple values. Copy and paste also works with this functionality

errors.flowID: Provide only positive integers as values

errors.duplicate: A keyword with name {keywordName} already exists. Please choose a different name.

tableSettings.title: Table Settings
tableSettings.info: Leaving without clicking the 'Save' button will not update the table

errors.duplicate: An organization with name {organizationName} already exists. Please choose a different name.
errors.conflict: An organization with provided name already exists. Please choose a different name.

formErrors.name: Organization Name is a required field
formErrors.abbreviation: Organization Abbreviation is a required field
formErrors.organizationType: Organization Type is a required field

modal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this flow? All the information will be deleted.

text.collectiveOrganization: The Collective Organization setting indicates that the organization is a 'stand-in' for one or more organizations of the same Organization Type (e.g., “Red Cross Organizations”), and is used when the specific organizations are not known or need to be masked for security purposes
text.organizationType: This is an only read field that fills based on the 'Organization Type'
text.create: Provide information to add a new organization, this organization will be accesible in all HPC tools applications. Fields marked with '*' are mandatory.
text.edit: Edit the selected organization, or click the Delete button to PERMANENTLY DELETE the organization, this organization will be accesible in all HPC tools applications. Fields marked with '*' are mandatory
